languages: Understands the languages of its victims

abilities.name: Condition Immunities
abilities.description: blinded, charmed, deafened, grappled, prone, stunned, knocked unconscious

abilities.name: Blindsong
abilities.description: All hostile creatures that can hear the Hydra sing must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw at the start of their turn. If the Hydra sings with more than one head, all hostile creatures must subtract 1d4 from their saving throw. On a failure, the creature forgets the Hydra is there.

abilities.name: Spell Casting
abilities.description:
Charisma, Spell Save DC 20, +12 to hit

Dissonant Whispers
Hold Person
Confusion
Hypnotic Pattern

abilities.name: Damage Resistances
abilities.description: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from Nonmagical, non-silvered Attacks

abilities.name: Sing
abilities.description: The Hydra can use a bonus action to stop singing or to start its song with an additional head.

abilities.name: Regrowth
abilities.description: The Hydra can use a bonus action to begin regrowing a head that has died. It takes three Regrowth bonus actions to fully regrow a head. It regains 20 hit points each time it uses Regrowth.

abilities.name: Multireact
abilities.description: The Hydra can make two reactions per round as long as it has three or more heads.

abilities.name: Wail
abilities.description: After taking damage, the Hydra can use a reaction to wail. Creatures within 5ft of the Hydra when it wails take 2d4 psychic damage.

name: False Hydra

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The Hydra can use a claw attack and a bite attack on its turn for each head it has

actions.name: Bite
actions.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target.
Hit: 9 (1d10+4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target.
Hit: 8 (1d8+4) slashing damage. If the Hydra succeeds on a claw attack, it can choose to grapple the target instead of dealing damage. (The hydra can only grapple one creature at a time and cannot use its claw attack while grappling a creature.)
